metadata.dc:author: Hausmann, Axel
Vargas, Héctor A
metadata.dc:description: Three species of geometrid moths are reported from the extreme North of Chile. All three are new for the Chilean fauna: Scopula umbilicata (Fabricius, 1794) (Sterrhinae), Cataspilates grisescens Warren, 1897, and Pero obtusaria Prout, 1928 (Ennominae).
metadata.dc:title: Adiciones a la fauna de geométridos (Lepidoptera: Geometridae) de Chile.
[Additions to the geometrid fauna (Lepidoptera: Geometridae) of Chile].
